categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Mia Ikova was a Human female who was the elected leader of Haleodaon Kattada and also served as a Rebel Alliance sympathizer during the Galactic Civil War.
A year before the Battle of Yavin, Ikova welcomed Princess Leia Organa during her stay at Kattada. While the princess searched refuge she was found by stormtroopers and captured alongside Mia Ikova.

She was shot by Commander Karg and his stormtroopers and passed away in Leia's starship. Before passing away, she reminded a mourning Leia of her mission to help free the galaxy and that Leia was not guilty for her death.
